Business description: Transneft' AK OAO

Transneft specializes in transporting crude oil. Net sales break down by activity as follows:

- crude oil transportation services (71.5%): 442.2 Mt transported in 2020. At the end of 2020, the group has a network of 50,777 km;

- sales of crude oil and and petroleum products (15.2%);

- petroleum product transportation services (7.8%): at the end of 2020, owns a network of 16,422 km;

- other (5.5%): primarily storage, construction, and communication services.

Net sales break down geographically as follows: Russia (81%), China (14.9%) and other (4.1%).
